paragraph: A dog is a domesticated mammal that has been bred for companionship and various working purposes. They are known for their loyalty, intelligence, and affectionate nature towards their owners. Dogs come in a variety of breeds, shapes, and sizes, and are often considered as man's best friend due to their unwavering devotion and loving personalities.

dog.pronunciationTip: You're pronouncing 'v' like 'w', which is wrong. To pronounce the 'v' sound clearly, try putting your upper teeth on your lower lip.
sentences: He has a loyal dog who follows him everywhere.
She adopted a rescue dog from the shelter.
Dogs are one of the most popular domesticated animals.
Cats are also a common domesticated pet.
Dolphins are a type of aquatic mammal.
Humans are also classified as mammals.
This dog was bred for its hunting abilities.
The farm bred chickens for their eggs.
Many people keep pets for companionship.
The elderly often enjoy the companionship of their peers.

working.mistakeType: Placing stress on the wrong syllable
sentences: He is currently working as a software engineer.
She enjoys working with her hands and creating things.
Dogs are known for their loyalty to their owners.
She values loyalty in her friendships.
Dolphins are known for their high level of intelligence.
He is a professor of artificial intelligence.
Cats can be very affectionate with their owners.
She is known for being very affectionate towards her friends.
There are many different breeds of dogs.
She is interested in learning about different breeds of cats.
Dogs come in all shapes and sizes.
She prefers small dogs because of their size.
He is considered to be one of the best chefs in the city.
The proposal is being considered by the board.
